basic.description:
This course examines the impact of disease and disability on quality of life. The course material addresses the biomedical, social, psychological, and behavioural factors affecting the quality of life of individuals with a chronic disease or a physical, psychological, developmental or sensory impairment.
RECOMMENDATION    KNPE 333/3.0 or PHED 333/3.0 or PPHE 333/3.0.
basic.subject: HLTH
basic.title: Disease, Disability and Quality of Life

extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQUISITE  3rd yr in a HLTH major, PHED or KINE plan
